Register user.description:
Registers a new user to an API. The API base endpoint must be specified. A user ethereum private key can be provided.
If no privatekey is provided, a new privateKey generated and given to the user.

Invalidate user.description: Invalidates the user from the API. The user is no longer capable of doing any operation.

Set issuer role (only admin).description:
Gives "Issuer" credential to the target user. A user with an "Issuer" credential can issue new credentials to other users.
 Only the API Admin can give this credenital.

Issue credential.description: Gives an "Operator", "Verifier" or "Witness" credential to the target user. Only an issuer can issue these credentials.

Register device.description: Registers a new device into the DLT. The device CHID must be unique in each DLT.

Deregister device.description: Deregister a device from the DLT. New passports or proofs can not be generated in a deregistered device.

Issue passport.description:
Issues a new passport to a device. The device is defined through the mandatory "deviceDPP" argument, which contains the deviceCHID. 
DeviceDPP format: deviceCHID:xxxx
Document ID, Document Signature, and Issuer ID are optional.

Generate proof.description:
Issues a new proof into a device. DeviceCHID is mandatory.
Document ID, Document Signature, Issuer ID and type are optional.

Transfer Device.description: Transfers the ownership of a device to another account.

Read transfer proofs.description: Gets all the transfer proofs of a device, ordered by timestamp.

Read register proof.description: Get the register proof of a device.

Read passport issue proofs.description: Gets all the passport proofs of a device, ordered by timestamp.

Read generic proofs.description: Gets all the generic proofs of a device, ordered by timestamp.

Read deregister proof.description: Gets all the deregister proofs of a device, ordered by timestamp.

Check user roles.description: Gets the current roles of the user.

Get DID data.description: Gets the necessary data to construct the DID document.

Add service to DID document.description: Adds a new service to the DID document. Services require an endpoint, a type and a fragment. Description is optional.

Remove service from DID document.description: Removes a service from the DID document. The default service can't be removed.
